problem.p: A simple pendulum is pulled sideways from the equilibrium position and then released.
Immediately after the pendulum is released, the net force acting on it is directed:

choicegroup.choice: Along the string toward the pivot point
Along the string away from the pivot point

problem.p: My answer to part 1 is justified because:

choicegroup.choice: The force of tension is zero.
The net force on the ball is zero.
The normal force on the ball equals the force of tension.
The force of tension equals the weight of the ball.
